sqlMap.select:
SELECT TRACT_ID ,TRACT_NAME ,TRANS_MER_ID ,TRACT_AGENCY ,RATES_TYPE ,ACQ_AGENCY_ID ,ACQ_AGENCY_NAME ,PAY_TRACT ,TRACT_RATE ,TRACT_HIGHEST_FEE ,CREDIT_RATE_COST ,DEBIT_RATE_COST ,CREDIT_HIGHEST_COST ,DEBIT_HIGHEST_COST ,LOWEST_COST ,BYPAY_PROFIT ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,PER_CARD_QUOTA ,CARD_QUOTA ,CARD_COUNT ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,TRANS_TIME_BEGIN ,TRANS_TIME_END ,MCC ,NIGHT_FLAG ,INTEGRAL ,TRACT_QUOTA ,TRACT_FLAG ,TERMINAL_ID ,SPID ,CARD_FLAG ,TRACT_NUM FROM TRACT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND TRACT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(TRACT_ID) =#tract_id#
(TRACT_NAME) Like '%'||(#tract_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#tract_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RATES_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rates_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACQ_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#acq_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACQ_AGENCY_NAME) Like '%'||(#acq_agency_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_RATE) Like '%'||(#tract_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#tract_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#credit_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#debit_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#credit_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#debit_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_COST) Like '%'||(#lowest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BYPAY_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#bypay_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MCC) Like '%'||(#mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NIGHT_FLAG) Like '%'||(#night_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INTEGRAL) Like '%'||(#integral:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#tract_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_FLAG) Like '%'||(#tract_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_FLAG) Like '%'||(#card_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_NUM) Like '%'||(#tract_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM TRACT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND TRACT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(TRACT_ID) =#tract_id#
(TRACT_NAME) Like '%'||(#tract_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#tract_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RATES_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rates_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACQ_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#acq_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACQ_AGENCY_NAME) Like '%'||(#acq_agency_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_RATE) Like '%'||(#tract_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#tract_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#credit_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#debit_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREDIT_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#credit_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DEBIT_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#debit_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_COST) Like '%'||(#lowest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BYPAY_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#bypay_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MCC) Like '%'||(#mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NIGHT_FLAG) Like '%'||(#night_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(INTEGRAL) Like '%'||(#integral:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#tract_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_FLAG) Like '%'||(#tract_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_FLAG) Like '%'||(#card_flag:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_NUM) Like '%'||(#tract_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
